messages.content:
Hi there! Nice to have you back. How can I help today? If you’re not sure, here are some options:

- Explain a concept or topic
- Help with writing, editing, or drafting (emails, essays, reports)
- Code help or debugging
- Brainstorm ideas or plans (projects, trips, events)
 Quick answers, math problems, or data analysis
- Practice a language or improve communication

Tell me what you’d like to work on, or share any details you have and we’ll get started.
